title: I can't Log into the PBE
body:
When I try to log into the PBE nothing happens, it just says logging in and then nothing happens.  I also tried logging into the PBE website but that didn't help either it popped up and said "You must first create a Summoner by logging into League of Legends before logging into our website." 

Thanks for the help!

replies.body: Thank you! We are looking into it right now!
I'm also having the same issue, however its now... and I'm not sure if anyone will notice this post.

Don't be alarmed it's a simple server side error. League gets many many players that are trying to log in at all times during the day. Thus, what happens is it has to put people into a queue which is like a waiting list, once you're first in the queue it should automatically log you in. As for the website I would suggest deleting cookies and trying again.

> Don't be alarmed it's a simple server side error. League gets many many players that are trying to log in at all times during the day. Thus, what happens is it has to put people into a queue which is like a waiting list, once you're first in the queue it should automatically log you in. As for the website I would suggest deleting cookies and trying again.

wrong issue. don't talk about something you know nothing about.

Forza i'm going to kindly just tell you that this could resolve his issue. It has happened to me before.
I left the queue up all day long and returned home 8 hours later and it sill said logging in so...  I don't think that we are having the same problem frewbert.
I'm having the same problem, but now the servers are down maybe they are rolling out a patch to fix this.
